tool_description: Analyzes container resource consumption patterns, calculates utilization statistics, and identifies resource bottlenecks and waste.

metrics_data.description: Array of numeric metric values to analyze

resource_type.description: Type of resource being analyzed: cpu, memory, disk, network

error_messages: Empty metrics data: Provide non-empty array of numeric values.
Invalid resource type: Use one of [cpu, memory, disk, network].
Invalid analysis window: Must be between 5-1440 minutes.
Invalid percentiles: All values must be integers between 0-100.
Insufficient data: Need at least 10 data points for meaningful analysis.
usage: Provide metrics_data array and resource_type, optionally set analysis_window and percentiles. Returns comprehensive resource utilization statistics.

percentile_values.description: Resource usage values at requested percentiles
